Uses of Package
com.viaoa.html

  • Packages that use com.viaoa.html 
    Package Description
    com.viaoa.html
    OA HTML components for JSP web applications, replaced with OAJSP package.
  • Classes in com.viaoa.html used by com.viaoa.html 
    Class and Description
    OAApplication
    Central object shared by all users within an application.
    OABase
    base class used by OAForm, OASession, OAApplication, OASystem for storing objects and messages.
    OAButtonGroup
    used with OAToggleButtons to make sure that only one button is selected at a time.
    OACheckBox
    CheckBox that can be used for the following purposes:
    1: set a property to either a selected or unselected value.
    2: add/remove an object to/from Hub.
    3: checkbox group to add remove many objects from a master list Hub to a Hub.
    OAComboBox
    OAComboBox that uses a masterHub and another hub with all of the values to use.
    OACommand
    Includes built in commands and the option to create a passthru command to a url (.jsp).
    OADataTable 
    OAFileInput
    Component for uploading a file from the browser to the server.
    OAForm
    Container that represents a HTML Form and holds OAHtmlComponents.
    OAFrame 
    OAFrameSet 
    OAHtmlComponent 
    OAHtmlListener 
    OAImage
    Object to display dynamic images: normal, select, disabled, invisible, mouseOver, mouseDown.
    OALabel
    OALabel will output the string value for a property path
    OALink
    OALink: Example
    OAList
    creates a multiList using two hubs: one with all the options, and another with selected options.
    OAPasswordField
    [Java Code] OAPasswordField ptxt = new OAPasswordField(hub,"password"); form.add("txtPassword", ptxt); ....
    OARadio
    [Java Code] OARadio rad; rad = new OARadio(hubJob,"hourly",true); form.add("radHourly",rad); rad = new OARadio(hubJob,"salary",false); form.add("radSalary",rad); ....
    OARelationshipGrid 
    OASession
    Object used by one user.
    OASessionListener 
    OATabbedPane 
    OATable
    [Java Code] OATable table = new OATable(hubEducation); table.setScrollAmount(5); table.setSelected(true); OACommand cmd = new OACommand("select.gif"); table.addRowCommand("cmdSelect", cmd); cmd = new OACommand("next.gif",OACommand.NEXT); cmd.setInvisible("invisible.gif"); table.addRowCommand("cmdNext", cmd); cmd = new OACommand("next.gif",OACommand.PREVIOUS); cmd.setInvisible("invisible.gif"); table.addRowCommand("cmdPrevious", cmd); OATableColumn tc = new OATableColumn("educationid"); table.add(tc); tc = new OATableColumn(new String[] {"educationId","name"}); table.add(tc); form.add("tabEducation", table); ...
    OATableColumn
    represents columns within a OATable.
    OATextArea
    ObjectBound TextArea
    OATextField
    [Java Code] OATextField txt = new OATextField(hub,"name"); form.add("txtName", txt); ....
    OAToggleButton
    Button that has two states: Selected and Not Selected.
    OATree 
    OATreeData
    TreeNodeData for OATree.
    OATreeFormNode
    TreeFormNode for OATree.
    OATreeNode
    TreeNode for OATree.
